follows: preview OptiFine 1.12.2 HD U G6 pre1

installationPolicy.description: MANDATORY! Downloads OptiFine from the official site.
MANDATORY! Downloads CalaMariGold's fork of RPG-HUD from GitHub.
MANDATORY! Downloads Hit Indication from Modrinth.

OPTIONAL! Please fully read! Downloads Cleanroom Relauncher from CurseForge. This mod will load TREPIDATION with Cleanroom Loader, a fork of Forge, allowing for Java 24 to be used instead of the outdated Java 8. For many, this will reduce memory usage and startup time, increase world generation speed, and other performance improvements. HOWEVER, some users have reported a significant performance decrease, especially on older systems. Try it and compare with/without Cleanroom Relauncher. Note that you must have a Java 21+ runtime installation to use this. https://www.graalvm.org/downloads/
